Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Deux Polonaises de l’oratorio St Stanislas, S. 519

c. 1870–1874 · LW A302 · R. 186

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 13' 30"

  • 1.
  • 2.

These polonaises were written for the unfinished oratorio St Stanislas (S. 688; LW Q17; R. 671); they exist only in a version for solo piano.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/17 · Z. A/B 8860 · Piano Versions of His Own Works III · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

1.

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2.

This polonaise includes as a theme the Dąbrowski-Mazurek, which Liszt also used in Salve Polonia (S. 518; LW A225; R. 185) and which later became the Polish national anthem.

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 4
